biography: Søren Spanning was born on May 30, 1951 in Denmark. He is an actor, known for  A Royal Affair  (2012),  Borgen  (2010) and  Headhunter  (2009). He is married to  Karen-Lise Mynster . They have two children.

name: Harriet Walter
biography: Harriet Walter was born on September 24, 1950 in London, England as Harriet Mary Walter. She is an actress, known for  Sense and Sensibility  (1995),  The Young Victoria  (2009) and  Star Wars: The Force Awakens  (2015). She has been married to  Guy Paul  since May 21, 2011.

name: Bent Mejding
biography: Bent Mejding was born on January 14, 1937 in Denmark. He is an actor and director, known for  A Royal Affair  (2012),  Brothers  (2004) and  We Shall Overcome  (2006). He has been married to  Susse Wold  since May 21, 1983. He was previously married to  Susanne Theil .

name: Cyron Melville
biography: Cyron Melville was born on July 1, 1984 in Denmark. He is an actor, known for  Love and Rage  (2009),  A Royal Affair  (2012) and  Nymphomaniac: Vol. I  (2013).

name: Thomas W. Gabrielsson
biography: Thomas W. Gabrielsson was born on June 29, 1963 in Gothenburg, Sweden as Thomas Waern Gabrielsson. He is an actor, known for  A Royal Affair  (2012),  The Last Kingdom  (2015) and  The Killing  (2007).

name: David Dencik
biography: David Dencik was born on October 31, 1974 in Sweden as Karl David Sebastian Dencik. He is an actor, known for  Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy  (2011),  Brotherhood  (2009) and  A Royal Affair  (2012).

name: Trine Dyrholm
biography: Trine Dyrholm was born on April 15, 1972 in Odense, Denmark. She is an actress and director, known for  Love Is All You Need  (2012),  In a Better World  (2010) and  A Royal Affair  (2012).

name: Candy Wang
biography: Candy Wang was born on September 9, 1992 in Shanghai, China as Yijin Wang. She is an actress, known for  Falling in Love  (2017),  Dangerous Liaisons  (2012) and  Lonely Memory  (2015).

biography: Jean Favie is an actor, known for  Dangerous Liaisons  (2012),  Train Station  (2015) and  Good Guys Cant Afford Us  (2013).

name: Lisa Lu
biography: Lisa Lu was born on January 19, 1927 in Beijing, China as Yen Chun Lu. She is an actress and producer, known for  2012  (2009),  Qing guo qing cheng  (1975) and  The Last Emperor  (1987).

name: Ziyi Zhang
biography: Ziyi Zhang is a Chinese actress and model. She is best known for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon (2000), Rush Hour 2 (2001), Hero (2002), House of Flying Daggers (2004), and Memoirs of a Geisha (2005). She made her feature film debut in The Road Home (1999). For her work in Memoirs of a Geisha she was nominated for an Golden Globe for Best Actress.

biography: Cecilia Cheung (Cecilia Cheung Pak-Chi) was born in Hong Kong to a Cantonese father and a half Cantonese-half British mother. name: Grace Kiley
biography: Grace Kiley is an actress and director, known for  Silver Stream  (2018),  The Comedy  (2012) and  Bleeding  (2009).

name: Angus Hepburn
biography: Angus Hepburn is known for his work on  The Post  (2017),  30 Rock  (2006) and  Meridian  (2002).

name: Richard Swift
biography: Richard Swift is an actor, known for  The Comedy  (2012),  Saturday Night Live  (1975) and  The Album Chart Show  (2006).

biography: Nikolaj Arcel was born on August 25, 1972 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a writer and director, known for  A Royal Affair  (2012),  King's Game  (2004) and  The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo  (2009).

name: Will Sheff
biography: Will Sheff is a writer and director, known for  Down Down the Deep River  (2014),  Mary on a Wave  (2017) and  Okkervil River RIP  (2016).

name: Seth Koen
biography: Seth Koen was born on August 11, 1978 in Houston, Texas, USA as Seth Alan Koen. He is an actor and director, known for  Just a Grand  (2010),  The Comedy  (2012) and  Loss for Words  (2011).

name: Liza Kate

name: Alexia Rasmussen
biography: Alexia Rasmussen is an actress and assistant director, known for  Listen to Your Heart  (2010),  Creative Control  (2015) and  Our Idiot Brother  (2011).
